dc_title_s: Historical Anthracite coal seam, mining and permit data for Pennsylvania
dc_description_s: Coverages containing Anthracite coal seam data by quadrangle for the state of Pennsylvania. Digitized from the Harrisburg Bureau of Mining and Reclamation mylar map system each quadrangle contains multiple coverages identifying seams in that quad. Also includes coal mining refuse disposal sites, permitted sites, point coverages of deep mine entry and other surface features of deep mines and Small Operators Assistance Program (SOAP) areas.
